Class SentenceTrie

  • java.lang.Object
    • SentenceTrie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trie

    public class SentenceTrie
extends java.lang.Object
implements Trie
    Trie data structure to store sentences, each node is a SentenceTrieNode.
